import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap'; import {useSpring, animated} from 'react-spring' import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import ui from '../assets/hero-ui.png' import cloud from '../assets/1.png' import steps from '../assets/steps.png' import '../Home/Home.css' class Home extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); } render (){ const styles = { fontFamily: 'Menlo-Regular, Menlo, monospace', fontSize: 14, lineHeight: '10px', color: 'white', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' } return (

) } } export default Home;
